          <title>
            <string language="en">Extraction of pure salt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Extraktion des reinen Salzes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Extraction de sel pur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Extração do sal puro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Estrazione di sale puro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξαγωγή του καθαρού άλατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Extracción de la sal pura</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This diagram is an exercise to determine the steps in extracting pure salt from rock salt.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">crushing</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">dissolving</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">evaporation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <string language="en">pure salt</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Diagramm ist eine Übung, zum der Jobsteps
festzustellen, wenn es reines Salz vom Felsensalz extrahiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme est un exercice pour déterminer les 
étapes en extrayant le sel pur à partir du sel de roche.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este diagrama é um exercício para determinar as
etapas em extrair o sal puro do sal da rocha.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo schema è un'esercitazione per determinare
i punti nell'estrazione del sale puro dal sale della roccia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το διάγραμμα είναι μια άσκηση για να καθορίσει 
τα βήματα στην εξαγωγή του καθαρού άλατος από το άλας βράχου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este diagrama es un ejercicio para determinar los
pasos de progresión en extraer la sal pura de la sal de la roca.</string>
          </description>
